testCase.name: UserService should be defined after module initialization
UserService addUserToTeam() addUserToTeam() should throw error if the user is already present in the team
UserService addUserToTeam() addUserToOtherTeam() should successfully add user to the team if it is not present in the team
UserService deleteUserFromTeamById() deleteUserFromTeamById() should delete the user from team if it is present there
UserService deleteUserFromTeamById() should delete the user from team if it is present there
UserService updateUserRole() updateUserRole should successfully update the user role
UserService updateUserRole() updateUserRole should successfully update the user role
UserService isSystemAdmin() method should return true if the user role name is system_admin
UserService isSystemAdmin() method should return true if the user role name is guest_user
UserService isSystemAdmin() method should return false if the user role name is not system_admin or guest_user
UserService findUserTeamDetails() findUserTeamDetails() should return unqiue userteam object for that particular user in that team
DashboardService should be defined after module initialization
DashboardService getDashboardByTeamId() test 1 if team present
DashboardService fetchStatus method will return status of project test 1 if client status is null
DashboardService fetchStatus method will return status of project test 1 if client status is null

MultimdeiaCrudService uploadFile should return undefined if the file is not uploaded

MultimdeiaCrudService uploadFileToFolder should return undefined if the file is not uploaded

MultimdeiaCrudService getDefaultMultimediaForTeam() should return the default root multimedia for team who has no root files
MultimdeiaCrudService getDefaultMultimediaForTeam() should throw no found message if there is no multimedia present in the root file

MultimdeiaCrudService addFiles() should add files
MultimdeiaCrudService getDisplayFilesFromFolder() should return display files for a folder
MultimdeiaCrudService getDisplayFilesFromFolder() should return empty array if the files are not present in any sub folder
MultimdeiaCrudService getCommonFiles() should return the common root files present in the root folder
MultimdeiaCrudService getFolderList() should return list of sub folders
MultimdeiaCrudService deleteFilesFromSubFolder() should return all the files present in a particular folder
MultimdeiaCrudService deleteFilesAndFoldersFromRoot() should delete all the files and folders present in the root
MultimdeiaCrudService deleteMultipleFilesAndFolders() should delete multiple root multimedia files and folders present for a team
MultimdeiaCrudService deleteMultipleFilesAndFolders() should delete multiple multimedia files present in a sub-folder of a team
MultimdeiaCrudService addFolder() should create a new folder
MultimdeiaCrudService addFolder() should throw error if empty folderName is given
MultimdeiaCrudService getAllFilesInFolderForTeam() should return all files present in the folder
MultimdeiaCrudService getAllFilesForTeam() should return all files present in the team
MultimdeiaCrudService getAllFilesForTeam() should return all files present in root folder of the team
MultimdeiaCrudService addFilesAndFoldersIntoSlideshow() should add files and folders to the slide show
MultimdeiaCrudService addFilesAndFoldersIntoSlideshow() getMultimediaForSlideshow() should return all the multimedia present in an album for slide show
MultimdeiaCrudService addFilesAndFoldersIntoSlideshow() getMultimediaForSlideshow() should return all the root files present for slide show
TeamCrudService should be defined after module initialization
TeamCrudService updateTeam() should update the team test 1 if team not found
TeamCrudService updateTeam() should update the team test 2 if team found
TeamCrudService getTeamInfoById() get all 5 kpis details along with sprint and status test 1 if team not present in db
TeamCrudService getTeamInfoById() get all 5 kpis details along with sprint and status test 2 if team present in db and user is System Admin
TeamCrudService getTeamInfoById() get all 5 kpis details along with sprint and status test 3 if team present in db and user is not a System Admin

TeamCrudService getCenterByTeamId() should ftech all center in the team test 2 if team found

AuthService should be defined after module initialization
